td.content: s:patient presents with 2 weeks history of severe fever, severe chest pain, severe diarrhea and Respiratory. he is a 62 yr old m. he denies ever using cigarettes consumes more than 4 alcoholic drinks daily o:Height 71 in, Weight 171 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 83, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, Chest X-Ray shows right lower lobe infiltrate and abcess formation, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:administered amoxicillin-clavulanate - 2 g 2 x day, performed Chest X-Ray, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:M oncologist aged 63 yrs presents with increased severe chest pain, severe diarrhea and severe fever over 3 years. o:Height 72 in, Weight 174 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 116, DiastolicBP 77, Respiration 18, Sputum culture WBC present with gram positive diplococci, CBC WBC=12000 /mm3,Hgb=14 g/dL, Basic Metabolic Panel BUN=15 mg/dL,creatinine=0.8 mg/dL, rales Bil, mild rhonchi, crackles-LL, CTA-LL, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = diffuse tenderness, BS (+), no hepatosplenomegaly, Skin = decreased tugor a:Pneumonia p:administered clarithromycin - 250 mg 2xday, performed Sputum culture, CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
